features: Versatile for cooking, tossing and transferring food
Tongs lock closed for convenient storage
Soft, comfortable, non-slip grips and thumb rests
Nylon heads are high-heat resistant and safe for non-stick cookware
body.description: Product Description A kitchen essential, a good pair of tongs will see you through the toughest cooking tasks while protecting your busy hands from the heat of the oven or stovetop. The OXO Good Grips 9-inch Tongs with Nylon Heads are constructed with sturdy, high-heat resistant nylon, so they’ll stand up to hot grills while being safe for your non-stick skillets. Our Tongs feature scalloped edges for a secure grip whether you're rotating thin asparagus or flipping a thick steak. The handles provide a non-slip grip and absorb pressure so you can grip, toss, turn and flip with comfort and control. The Tongs lock closed for compact storage when hanging or in a drawer. The 9-in/22.5 cm size fits comfortably in the hand. Dishwasher safe. Also available in 12-inch size. Amazon.com Not only do these 9-inch tongs cushion hands and provide thumb rests, which are useful when gripping heavy objects, but the nylon heads wont scratch nonstick cookware. Doubling as a hang loop, a tab on the bottom pulls out to lock the stainless-steel tongs shut, allowing them to slip easily into a drawer. The nylon heads are heat-resistant to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, and the tongs are dishwasher-safe. --Ann Bieri

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and convenient
reviews.reviewText: The clasping mechanism is quite simple and quite effective. The build quality seems pretty solid. No true gripes about it. I was under the impression from the images the ends were rubberized, but the entire ends are just solid plastic. It doesn't effect my use, but if it may be different for others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tongs are the best!
reviews.reviewText: OXO does it again and has a super set of nylon, to be used in non-stick pans, tongs in two sizes. They work perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have in all kitchens
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't say these have the feel of silicone, which can be a good thing. It's more like a harder resin plastic material.They are great though! These kitchen tongs are the perfect size for a 10-in fry pan, or even to dip into something like a 4 quart or 6 quart pot or pan to stir meatballs and sauce, pasta in boiling water, throwing vegetables around a frying pan, EtcThey feel great in the hand, and unlocking the tongs is as easy as tapping them against your thigh like everyone else does. The lock is secure.Washing them is easy as well, since they tend to be non-stick at the tips. The trick is to use the tongs, and then try to rinse them off as soon as you can with some warm soapy water. Try not to let them sit overnight or anything dirty. It'll just be harder to clean them in the morning.I am a huge fan of Oxo good grips products, and this is definitely one of the best from the company.If you use these in combination with the Oxo good grips 10 inch nonstick frying pan, your frying pan will last a lot longer. They do not scratch any non-stick coating or anything. But whenever you grab onto something like a piece of frying chicken, or fish, you do get a solid connection and the feeling of confidence that nothing is going to slip out of these tongs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: OXO makes a lot of great products and this one is no exception. it works well, is sturdy and easy to clean in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Performer for Culinary Adventurers!
reviews.reviewText: In the wild kitchen of gastronomic exploration, these 9-inch tongs are a trusty companion for any daring chef. The gripping mechanism is smooth, and the locking feature ensures precision when maneuvering through the sizzling chaos of pots and pans. The nylon heads handle the heat without breaking a sweat, making them ideal for a variety of culinary escapades.While not without a minor quibble or two, these tongs remain stalwart in the face of kitchen challenges. The sturdy build instills confidence, and the 9-inch length strikes a harmonious balance between control and reach. If you're on a quest for culinary excellence and demand tools that can withstand the heat of the kitchen, these tongs are a worthy addition to your arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OXO Good Grips 9-Inch Locking Tongs with Nylon Heads
reviews.reviewText: Never had this type of tongs before -- I've only had scissor tongs. These are great! They work much better than my old ones. Better grip and overall easier to use. The locking feature also makes them easier to store in my utensil drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After tossing my old tongs I was pretty selective buying a replacement. These are just the right size and the silicone tips let you use in both metal and non stick pans. Working fine and dishwasher safe.
Great quality as always from OXO!
Qualidade não tem o que falar, assim como todos os produtos da Oxo que comprei. Manuseio higieni e não arranha minhas panelas. Satisfeita 😍

The media could not be loaded. No encontraba este tipo de pinzas en tiendas comerciales en MTY, MEX. Decidí comprarlas por Amazon y la verdad es que no me arrepiento. Tienen el largo suficiente para poder usarlas sin quemarte, las partes protectoras de las pinzas fue lo que más me gusto, ya que en las puntas trae esa protección que no raya las caserolas, así como protección en los laterales, previniendo que te quemes. Las he usado para dorar totopos, voltear tortillas, voltear chiles, capear camarones, voltear papas fritas, y algunas otras cosas más.Creo que son lo suficientemente resistentes al calor y al aceite.ñ, además que tienen un diseño muy elegante.Me gustó mucho! :)
Genial!! La he dado ya mucho uso y sigue como el primer día.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 25, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Turn stuff, pick stuff up. Rinse and repeat. That's what I want from a set of tongs.Turn stuff, pick stuff up... Most tongs will do this well enough. These do it really well, they feel nice in the hand and it's easy to grip food, etc, firmly.Rinse and repeat... Is it just me, but I like stuff to last. I've a few OXO items and they seem to last really well. Yes, there are cheaper alternatives. But as the saying goes "buy well, buy once". The OXO Good Grips Locking Tongs feel solid and well built. I expect them to keep going a long, long, time.What else do I like:The grips, on the handle, are slightly "sticky", it stops them slipping about.They can be locked closed and that mechanism doubles as a hoop for hanging them, so plenty of storage optionsBeen through the dishwasher a couple of times and have come out looking great.
